308207.「ゆりかごの末裔は 理解できない。\n まだ ジア・クトと 戦うつもり。\n 切:
The Descendants of the Cradle cannot be
comprehended. You still fight Dia Kut.
Yet you lost your one advantage...

308208.「そうともさ。私は 楽観主義者でね。\n まだまだ 戦いようはある。:
Right you are. I'm what you'd call an
optimist. I'm not ready to give up just yet.

308209.「てなワケで 助言をもらいにきた。 \n ざっくり言うと 魔眼の月に潜入し\n:
Which is why I'm here to ask for some advice.
In essence, I'd like to infiltrate the Eye of
Evil and destroy its cannon super weapon.

308210.「滅浄の大光を放つ 魔眼砲さえ\n 封じてしまえば アストルティア全土が\n 攻:
The cannon is what emits that Purging Pulse. If we can stop that, then an attack on the entirety of Astoltia can be diverted for the
time being.

308211.「その後は フォーリオンを 魔眼の月まで\n 移動させ 大攻勢をしかける。この天:
Once we do that, we'll then move Fourion to the Eye of Evil and launch a full offensive. The Firmament is actually based on a ship
that crossed between worlds many years ago.

308212.「これが 地上に被害を出さず \n 戦いに終止符を打つ 最良の策だ。:
I believe this is the best way to end all this
fighting without causing any damage to
the surface world.

308213.「ルーベも 同じことを 考えていたの。\n あんたたちに残された手段は 魔眼の月:
Rubay was also thinking the same. All that
remains is to infiltrate the Eye of Evil and
lay waste to it.

308214.「でも 魔眼の月が浮かぶのは 超高高度。\n 生身で飛んで 到達できる高さじゃな:
But the Eye floats at an extreme altitude.
Flying alone cannot reach such a height.

308215.「なーに その点は心配ないよ。\n 天星郷の至宝 天の箱舟で ひとっ飛びさ。:
Weeeell, don't worry about that. The
Starflight Express, pride of the Firmament...
It'll take us there in no time flat.

308216.「ルーベの念晶環で ジア・クトのことを\n 調べたなら わかっているはず。:
If you have researched Dia Kut in our
telecrystal ring, then surely you know.

308217.「魔眼の月の 索敵能力は 優秀。 \n 捕捉されれば 接近前に撃ち落とされる。:
The Eye of Evil's ability to spot is
excellent. You will be shot down long before
you approach.

308218.「問題ない。その点も 対策済みだ。: Not a problem. I thought of that as well.

308219.「……潜入する者たちが 決死隊となるなら\n 成立する可能性はあると 判断する。:
...if those who infiltrate decide to throw
their lives away, then a chance of working
it might. Survival is quite difficult...

308220.「遅かったじゃないか。\n どうだ？ 天の箱舟は動きそうか？:
You sure took your time. Well? Is the
Starflight Express working?

308221.「それが……。天の箱舟を 起動させるには\n 莫大なエネルギーが 必要なんです。:
Well...it would take an immense amount of
energy to get it running again. I'd say at
least as much as one of the trial's cores...

308222.「ま～た あのときと 同じ決断を\n 迫られるのか。試練場を 墜とすか否か。:
Uuugh...are we really having to make this
same decision again? Do we really have to
drop one of the trial areas...?

308223.「のちの決戦を見すえれば ここで中心核を\n ひとつ失うのは 痛手だが……\n:
In preparation of the battle to come, it would be quite the blow to lose one of the cores... Do we have no choice but to drop it...?
Drop...it... huh?

308224.「そういえば お前が 過去へ行くのに立ち寄った\n 神代の島も かつては 天星郷:
Now that I think about it, the Ancient Isle
you once visited used to be part of the
Firmament, but broke off a long time ago.

308225.「天星郷の一部だったなら\n 同じ仕組みで浮いている以上 神代の島にも\n 中心:
If it was a part of the Firmament, then that
means it'd would've used the same floating
mechanism and have a core of its own, right?

308226.「大昔に墜ちて 放置されたものなら \n 中心核のエネルギーも\n とっくに枯渇:
If it fell and crashed down a long time ago
and hasn't been used since, then I think
the core would be long depleted...

308227.「だが 残っている可能性もある。\n そこに 賭けてみよう。:
But there is a chance there is still something
left. We should bet on that.

308228.「中心核を回収できれば 万々歳。\n そうでないときは……苦渋の決断をしよう。:
If we can recover the core, then great!
If not, then...we'll have to make a painful
decision.

308229.「とりあえず <pc>と クリュトスで\n 神代の島へ行き 神殿跡を探索して\n:
In the meantime, you and <pc>
should go to the Ancient Isle and search for
a core inside the temple.

308230.「長年 放出されてきた エネルギーの残滓が\n 寄り集まって 魔物と化したのでし:
The energy's residue released over all these
years must've gathered together and turned
into monsters.

308231.「魔物が 中心核に 害を与えなかったのは\n 不幸中の さいわいと言えますが……:
We're really lucky that those monsters
didn't harm the core, though...

308232.「それ以上に 島が墜落したというのに\n 中心核だけ 残っているなんて……\n:
Beyond that, the fact that this island crashed
down and the only thing that remained was
the core...it's like witnessing a miracle.

308233.「おそらく 浮島墜落の原因は \n 浮力を発生させる 別の装置のほうに\n なん:
Perhaps it crashed due to some kind of
malfunction in the other device that allows
it to float.

308234.「天の箱舟から 取りはずしてきた この核納器に\n さっそく あの中心核を 移し:
I'll put the core inside this core container
I took from the Starlight Express.

308235.「あれだけのエネルギーが こんな\n 小さな容器に 収まってしまうとは……。\n:
To think that such huge energy could be
contained in such a tiny container...
Our ancestors' technology is amazing!

308236.「いつの日か 僕たちも\n ご先祖様に 引けを取らないだけの\n 技術力を 身に:
I hope that we can one day be as
technologically advanced as they were.

308237.「さてと これで 天の箱舟を起動させる\n 目途が立ちました。天使長の悩みの種を:
With this, we've made progress on getting the Starflight Express up and running. That's one less thing for the Archangel to worry about...
and I'm glad, too.

308238.「つねに きびしい選択を 迫られる立場は\n おつらいでしょうから……。:
It must be pretty tough to be someone in a
position where you are always forced to
make tough decisions, huh...

308239.「急ぎ 聖天舎に戻り ここでのことを\n 天使長に 報告しましょう。:
Let's hurry back to the monastery and let the
Archangel know what happened here.

308240.「おお！ 待ちかねたぞ ふたりとも。\n で 首尾は どうなった？: Oh! You're both back! So? How did things go?

308241.「中心核の 保存状態が良好でしたので\n 無事に 持ち帰れました。\n 天の箱舟:
The core was still intact, so we were able to
contain it safely. I'll be able to get the
Starflight Express up and running now.

308242.「あー よかったぁ。ルティアナ様に 感謝だな。\n 試練場を つぶすなんて決断\:
Ohhh, thank Lutiana... I didn't even want to
think about making the decision to get rid
of one of the trial areas.

308243.「しかし すごいな……。こんな小さな物に\n あの中心核が すっぽり 収まるのか:
But it's simply amazing...the core really fits
inside that tiny object? That's a part of the
Starflight Express, right?

308244.「ええ。至宝と呼ばれるだけあって\n 未知の技術で 作られてます。\n 扱うこと:
Yeah. It's quite the valuable treasure, and it's made from unknown technology. I can handle it, but I still don't fully understand
how it works...

308245.「とこしえのゆりかごの 技術か……。\n 返す返すも 故郷を蹂躙してくれた\n:
Technology of the Eternal Cradle, huh...
Dia Kut is going to get the payback they
deserve for wrecking our homeland.

308246.「奴らに反攻をしかける 最初の一歩として……\n クリュトス。お前は 天の箱舟を:
As for the first step to launching our
counterattack... Krutos. I'll need you to get
the Starflight Express running ASAP.

308247.「はい！ おまかせください。\n かならずや 飛ばしてみせます。:
Got it! Leave it to me. I'll make sure she
flies.

308248.「<pc>さんも\n ご協力 ありがとうございました。:
Thanks a lot for helping us out,
<pc>!

308249.「私からも ひとつ……<pc>に\n 報告しておきたいことが あってな。\n そ:
There's one more thing I need to tell you
about, <pc>... It's...about Yuliza's
current condition.

308250.「依然として 意識が戻らない。\n 悔しいが 手のほどこしようが ないんだ。:
She still hasn't regained consciousness.
Sorry, but there's nothing we can do.

308251.「ひょっとしたら テトラル様のように\n 突然 目覚めるかもしれないし……逆に\:
Maybe she'll awaken suddenly like Tetral did,
or...maybe she'll be asleep forever.

308252.「ン……潜入作戦のことだがな\n 決行前に 詳細を詰めるため\n もう一度 ルー:
Ahem...I'd like to go and talk with Rubay one
more time to iron out the details of our
operation before heading in.

308253.「今度は 英雄たちを交えての 会議だ。\n 一緒に ルーベを監禁している\n 部:
We'll be meeting up with the other champions.
Please follow me to the room where we're
keeping Rubay.

308254.<pc>と ミトラーは 聖天舎を出て\n回生堂にいる ジア・ルーベのもとへ向かっ:
<pc> and Mitra left the monastery and
headed for the rest spot, where Dia Rubay
was being held.

308256.「そりゃ そうだろ。\n 敵同士が 一緒にいるんだからよ。:
Of course I am! We are here with our enemy,
after all!

308257.「ミトラーさま。この方を頼って\n 作戦を立てていると 聞きましたけど\n 本当:
Mitra...I heard that you are relying on her to
help plan the operation, but...is this really
the right thing to do...?

308258.「不安は わかる。でもね ルーベを信じるのは\n こちらに寝返るだけの 理由があ:
I understand your concerns. But I trust Rubay because she has every reason to defect to our side. And above all, she's the only source of
information we have about our enemy.

308259.「ゲノスを 粉々に 砕いてくれるなら\n どんな相手とだって 手を組む。\n 裏:
To anyone who will smash Genos, we will work
with them. We will not betray you. As long as
our interests align.

308260.「時間が惜しい。さっそく ジア・クトとの\n 最終決戦の 詳細を詰めるとしよう。:
We're running out of time. Let's get down to
business about our final showdown with
Dia Kut.

308261.「魔眼の月を ぶっ壊しにいくってのは\n ちらっと 聞いてるよ。あそこまで\n:
I overheard a bit about how we're going to
destroy the Eye of Evil. I'm not really sure
how we'll get there, though.

308262.「至宝 天の箱舟を飛ばす 目途が立った。\n 魔眼の月に 到着するまで\n 快適:
The pride that is the Starflight Express is

308263.「箱船に乗って 空の旅……ですか。\n 途中で 撃墜される可能性があるのでは？\:
So we are using that to travel through the sky...isn't it likely that we would be shot down? I don't think our enemy would let us
pass so easily.

308264.「心配ご無用。敵から 姿を隠すことができる\n アストルティアの楯の加護が 発揮:
No need to worry. Dia Kut will not see you
if you have the Shield of Astoltia. It will
conceal you from their sight.

308265.「とはいえ 敵地たる魔眼の月 潜入後は\n その加護も さすがに 通用しなくなる:
However, once you infiltrate, you will no

for unavoidable battles.

308266.「天の箱舟で 魔眼の月のどこに\n 着陸するかだが……ルーベからもらった\n こ:
The choice of where to land the Starflight Express inside of the Eye...that's all thanks to the information from this telecrystal
ring Rubay gave me.

308267.「ふだん 使われていない 搬入口があるの。 \n そこなら 待ち伏せにあわない。:
A service entrance exists that is not usually

Assuming you are not unlucky.

308269.「俺たちは 念晶巨人の核を 神剣で砕いた。\n 危険を冒して 潜入せずとも\n:
We shattered the Telecrystal Titan's core

and just shatter the Eye of Evil the same way?

308270.「時間が かかりすぎる。高エネルギー反応を\n 付近に感知すれば 集中砲火を浴び:
It would take much too long. If a high energy signature is detected, you will be under heavy assault. You want to try? Are you
prepared to die?

308271.「結局 潜入するしか ないようだね。\n ジア・レド・ゲノスを討つまで 帰還でき:
I guess we'll have to sneak in after all. We
can't leave until Genos is defeated. We're
a suicide squad, if you will.

308272.「いや 目指すのは ゲノス討伐じゃない。: No. The mission is not defeating Genos.

308273.「この作戦の目標は 奴らの超兵器\n 滅浄の大光の 無力化にある。:
The goal of this operation is to neutralize
their superweapon, the Purging Pulse.

308274.「天の聖壇に撃たれた 裁きの閃光を\n 覚えているか？ 滅浄の大光は あれと\n:
Remember the flash of judgment that was shot
at the Heavenly Altar? The Purging Pulse is a
much stronger version of that.

308275.「その射程は アストルティア全土を\n とらえている。撃たれれば 逃げ場はない。:
Its firing range will hit the entirety of
Astoltia. If it fires, there'll be no escape.

308276.「あれは この世界を ジア・クトの生態に適した\n 環境に作り変えるのが 目的の:
A weapon with the purpose of remaking this
world into an environment suitable for Dia
Kut. This world will die. As will you all.

308277.「滅浄の大光を放つ 魔眼砲の機関部の破壊。 \n これこそ 本作戦の 最優先目標:
Destroy the engine of the Eye of Evil's cannon, the source of the Purging Pulse. This is the mission's top priority. After
that, return here quickly.

308278.「どう破壊するかは あとで教えるとして\n 問題は 潜入後 いかにして\n 魔眼:
I'll tell you more about how to destroy it
later. The problem now is how to reach the
engine once you infiltrate...

308279.「もし 潜入がバレたら ジア・クトが\n いっせいに 襲いかかってくるよね。\n:
If they find out we've infiltrated, then Dia
Kut will just send a horde after us. It will
be a total disaster...

308280.「その通りだ。敵地で 一丸となって\n 進むのは 悪手だからな……。\n よって:
That's right. Advancing as a single group in
enemy territory is not a good idea...that's
why I want you split up into teams.

308281.「それで 最初に 機関部に到達した班が \n 破壊工作をおこなう。魔眼砲さえ 封:
The first team to reach the engine will be the ones to sabotage it. If we can just disable the cannon, then we don't have to worry
about complete annihilation from the Pulse.

308282.「本当に ゲノスを倒さずに\n 帰還して よいのか？\n 奴を倒さぬ限り 戦いは:
Are you sure it's wise to return without
defeating Genos? This battle will not end
until he is defeated.

308283.「倒さないとは 言ってないよ。諸君らが\n 帰還したあと 天星郷を 魔眼の月へ近:
I'm not saying we won't beat him. After you return, we'll have the Firmament moved closer to the Eye of Evil to launch a massive
assault. That's when we'll beat him.

308284.「帰還後 諸君らに余力があれば\n ぜひ 戦列に加わってほしい。\n 説明は以上:
When you do return, assuming you have any
strength left, we'd like you to join in the
battle. That's all for now. Any questions?

308285.「よし！ 天の箱舟の 整備が終了次第\n 諸君には 魔眼の月に向けて 出発しても:
Very good! As soon as the Starflight Express
is operational, you'll depart for the Eye.
Until then, you may do as you please.

308286.「自由にって 言われてもなぁ……。\n そわそわしちまって 落ち着かねえよ。なあ:
Even being told I can do as I please...
I can't help but feel restless, ya know?

308287.「<pc>。お前に 少し頼みがある。 \n 回生堂の １階にいるから\n あとで:
I need a small favor from you,
<pc>. I'll be on the rest spot's
first floor, so please come and see me.

308288.「<pc>さんが 一番乗りだったんですね。\n お待たせして すみません。もう:
I see that <pc> was the first to
arrive. Sorry to keep you waiting. The other
heroes will be arriving soon.

308289.「なんだ なんだ。先客がいるのか。\n ずいぶん 張り切ってるじゃないか。:
What is it? There's someone here before you?
You're really working hard, aren't you?

308290.「クリュトスが 整備を急いでくれたおかげで\n どうにか 天の箱舟を 飛ばせるよ:
Thanks to Krutos' haste to get things up and
running, we somehow managed to get Starflight
Express up and running.

308291.「前にも言ったが 飛行中は\n 敵の攻撃に さらされることなく\n 魔眼の月に接:
As I said before, during the flight we will be
able to approach and infiltrate the Eye of
Evil without exposing ourselves to enemy fire.

308292.「天の箱舟の操縦は クリュトスが担当。 \n 潜入後 英雄たちは ３班に分かれた:
The Starflight Express is piloted by Krutos.After infiltration, the heroes will be divided into three groups to destroy the Eye
of Evil cannon engine.

308293.「編成は第１班が カブと ドルタム\n ナンナの三闘士で 第２班は ラダ・ガート:
The first group will be made up of Kabu and Doltam Nanna's Triad, and the second group will be made up of Lada Gart and Linashe
Fostail.

308294.「そして 第３班だが <pc>と\n ハクオウの２名のみだ。アシュレイがいたなら:
If Ashley were here, he would be in this
group.

308295.「言っても 詮無いことです。\n 彼は もう……いない。: It doesn't matter. He is gone.

308296.「そうだな……。各班のリーダーだが カブ\n ラダ・ガート <pc>に担当しても:
Right. As for the leaders of each group, Kabu Lada Gart will be in charge. All three of you come with me. I have something
for you.

308298.「これらは ジア・ルーベの念晶環を解析し\n 聖天のレンズで 生成したものだ。\:
These were generated by analyzing Dia Rubay's telecrystal rings and using the lens of the Holy Heaven. Somehow, I was able to line up
the three of them.

308299.「念晶環は 魔眼の月の内部を 移動する際に \n 必要となる。また 魔眼砲の機関:
The telecrystal ring is needed to move around inside the Eye of Evil. The method for destroying the Engine of the Eye of Evil
cannon is also recorded on it.

308300.「競争ではないが 一番乗りで \n 魔眼砲の機関部に たどり着いた班が\n 破壊:
It's not a race, but the first team to reach
the Eye of Evil cannon's Engine will be the
first to sabotage it.

308301.「念晶環に記録された情報は 天の箱舟で\n 移動中に 皆で 共有しておくように。:
The information recorded in the telecrystal ring should be shared with everyone while traveling on Starflight Express. Now, do you
have any questions?

308302.「あなた方 天使は この作戦に\n 参加しないのですか？:
You angels will not participate in this
operation?

308303.「潜入には 参加しない。\n 率直に言って……我々は足手まといだ。:
We will not participate in the infiltration.
Frankly, we're slowing you down.

308304.「ごめんなさい。英雄たちでなければ\n この作戦を 成功させられないのよ……。:
I'm sorry. It takes heroes to make this
mission successful.

308305.「くやしいが 彼女の言うとおりだ。\n 俺たちは お前たちの成功を信じ\n その:
I'm sorry, but she's right. We believe in your
success, and we'll be ready for the big
offensive that follows.

308306.「魔眼砲の破壊に 成功したら\n すみやかに 天星郷に帰還してくれ。\n まちが:
If you succeed in destroying the Eye of Evil
cannon, return to the Firmament immediately.
Do not try to challenge the Genos.

308307.「ゲノス討伐を目的とした 大攻勢の成否は\n お前たちに かかっている。いろいろ:
The success or failure of the great offensive to defeat the Genos depends on you. I know you have many thoughts on the matter, but I ask
that you do your part.

308308.「了解したよ。そろそろ 出発しようか。\n いつ なんどき ジア・クトの超兵器が:
I understand. Let's get going. We never know
when Dia Kut's super-weapon might be launched
on the ground.

308309.「吉報を待つ。ルティアナ様のご加護が\n 皆に あらんことを！:
I await the good news, and may the blessings
of Lutiana be with you all!

308311.「お前 また 後先考えずに！\n 神化に失敗したことを もう忘れたのか！:
You, again, without thinking! Have you already
forgotten that you failed in deification?

308312.「悔しいが 我々は 戦力として劣る。\n 作戦の遂行を さまたげるだけだ。:
I'm sorry, but we are not as strong as we
should be. It will only hinder our ability to
carry out our mission.

308314.「ひとりぐらい\n 一緒に戦う天使が いたっていい！:
It's okay to have at least one angel fighting
with you!

308316.「いいさ……。好きにさせてやろう。\n 言って聞くような タマじゃないしな。:
Fine, I'll let you do what you want. I'll let
him do what he wants. I don't have the guts to

Yuliza, you should go too! I can handle the
rest on my own!

308461.「あなたって人は！\n また 生前と同じ過ちを くり返すのですか！\n 私たちを:
You..! You're going to make the same mistakes
again? You have to trust us!

308462.「信用しているからこそです。\n ほかの皆も 私たちと同じように\n 魔眼の中枢:
It's because we trust them. I'm sure everyone
else is trying to get to Eye of Evil's Core
just as much as we are!

308463.「ここで モタモタしていられません。\n 私も かならず 合流しますから！:
We can't afford to be slow here. I'll join you
in due course!

308464.「ハクオウの言葉を信じ\n 今は 先へ進みましょう。:
Believe in Hakuo's words. Let's move on for
now.

308465.「天星郷で得た 信頼と友情……。\n 私は もう ひとりではない。\n 背中を預:
The trust and friendship I gained at the
Firmament. I am no longer alone. I have a
companion to whom I can entrust my back!

308466.「よもや 第二の魔眼砲が 存在していたとはね。\n ころばぬ先のキラポンという:
I didn't know there was a second Eye of Evil
gun. I would like to ask if Dia Kut also has
the idiom "Koroban nuno tachi no kirapon".

308467.「くそっ すべての扉を 開放すると\n 言っていたが ここだけは別のようだ。\n:
Damn it. He said he'd open all the doors, but
not this one. If only I had my sacred sword, I
could break it down.

308468.「<cs_pchero>さまも わたくしたちと同様\n きっと ここを目指してい:
<13_aaaaaac>I am sure that they are heading here just like
us. For now, let's wait for their arrival.

308470.「左様。歓迎しよう。\n ゆりかごの末裔たちよ。:
To the left. Let us welcome Descendants of the
Cradle.

308471.「過去に あまたの種族を 滅ぼしてきたが\n 我が居城の最奥 魔眼の中枢まで\n:
We have destroyed many races in the past, but
none of them have ever invaded the Eye of
Evil's Core, the innermost part of our castle.

308472.「ゆえに そなたらを評価している。\n 入るがいい。謁見を許そう。:
That's why we value you. Enter. I will grant
you an audience.

308473.「臆したか…………つまらぬ。: You are a coward or a bore.

308474.「余を滅ぼす またとない機会。\n 万にひとつの 勝機に賭けぬというのなら……。:
A unique opportunity to destroy me. If you
don't take a chance on this one, you'll never
win.

308475.「臆病者に 拝謁の栄誉は与えられぬ。:
No coward will be granted the honor of an
audience.

308476.「行きましょう！ あいつを倒せるのは\n 今しかありません！ 時が来たんです！:
Let's go! It's now or never, we can beat him!
It's time!

308477.「よくぞ言った！ お前の決断に乗るぞ。: Well said! I'm on board with your decision.

308478.「光に魅入られた羽虫は そうとは知らず\n 炎の中に 飛び込むというが……\n:
They say that a winged insect attracted by the
light will jump into the flames without
knowing it, but you are just like insects.

308480.「なかなかに 壮観であろう？\n 血肉を持つ者が 結晶化した姿には\n 得も言わ:
It's quite a spectacle, isn't it? The
crystallized form of the flesh and blood has
an indescribable charm.

308481.「ジア・クトの結晶化は\n もう きかなくなったはずなのに……。:
Dia Kut's crystallization should no longer be
going into clinical contention.

308482.「万象の王たる余を 見くびるな。\n そなたらの 結晶化をふせぐ 技術など\n:
Do not underestimate me, the king of all
things. The technology that prevents your
crystallization is powerless against my power.

308483.「私たちだけで このジア・レド・ゲノスを\n 倒せるでしょうか……。:
Can we defeat this Dia Ledo Genos by
ourselves?

308485.「戦いになど なるものか！\n 目の前の現実！ とくと見よ！:
There will be no battle! The reality is right
in front of you! See for yourself!

308486.「余の光を 受け止めるか……！？\n 他の虫けらとは 格が違うようだ。:
Will they catch my light? You are different
from other insects.

308487.「段々と 威力を上げてやろう。\n どこまで 耐えられるかな……。:
Let's increase the power step by step. Let's
see how much you can take.

308488.「早くも ふせぐ手立てが なくなったな。\n どうする？ 命乞いでも試してみるか:
I'm already running out of ways to prevent
this. What should we do? Try begging for your
life?

308489.「あなたは 逃げてください。 \n 私が盾になります！: You should run.I will be SHIELD!

308490.「再戦の機会は かならず あります。\n あなたは その戦いに欠かせない英雄なん:
There will always be a rematch. You are the
hero of the battle! So live!

308491.「仲良く 彫像になるがいい！！: Get along and be a statue!

308492.「未来への希望をつなぐ 礎になれるなら \n この命 差しだしてもいいッ！:
I'm willing to give my life if I can be the
foundation for the hope of the future!

308493.「私は……人を愛するために\n 生まれてきたのだから！: I was born to love people!

308495.「光輪！？ 旧き世の天使にしか\n ないはずなのに……神化の効果が\n 今になっ:
A halo! It is supposed to be only for angels
of the old world, but did the effect of
deification appear only now?

308496.「神化だと……？\n なるほど。そなたらには\n 自分たちの神を生む 秘儀がある:
Deification, you say? I see. You have a secret
ritual that gives birth to your god.

308497.「<cs_pchero> 前言撤回です。\n 今の私たちなら ゲノスを倒せます！:
<13_aaaaaac> I take back my previous statement. We can
defeat the genos now! Let's end all this here!

308498.「気が変わった……。そなたらには\n 余が じきじきに手を下そう。たまには\n:
I have changed my mind. I will take care of
you soon. I must move the telecrystal once in
a while, or its brilliance will be clouded.

308499.「ありったけの命脈を 神剣に \n そそぎましょう。そして 最大級の一撃を！:
Let's pour our lifeblood into the divine sword
and strike the greatest blow! And strike the
greatest blow possible!

308500.「ああ！ 出し惜しみは しない！:
Oh, I'm not going to spare it! I'll spare no
expense!

308501.「<cs_pchero> 今です！\n この一撃に すべてを かけましょう！:
<13_aaaaaac> It's now! Let's put everything we've got into
this one blow!

308502.「やったね！ <cs_pchero>兄ちゃん！\n これで もう 大丈夫だよ！: You did it!<13_aaaaaac>Brother! It's all right now!

308503.「やったね！ <cs_pchero>姉ちゃん！\n これで もう 大丈夫だよ！: You did it!<13_aaaaaac>Sis! Now you're all right!

308504.「そんな！？ あれは……魔眼の月の破片？: Oh, no! Is that a piece of Eye of Evil?

308505.「いや ジア・クトの船の 残骸だ……。\n あんな物が落ちれば 町ひとつくらい\:
No, it's the wreckage of Dia Kut's ship. If
that thing fell, it would wipe out an entire
town!

308506.「町ひとつで済めば まだ マシ……。\n 大陸ひとつ 焼き尽くしかねないね。:
It's better if it's just one town. You could
burn an entire continent to the ground.

308508.「間に合わないかも しれませんが……\n もう一度 神剣を使いましょう！:
We may not make it in time, but let's use the
divine sword again!

308510.「あんな石ころ ひとつで……ボクらの努力を\n 帳消しになんか させるもんか！:
I won't let a single rock like that cancel out
all our efforts!

308511.「せめて……海に 落とせれば……。 \n 兄ちゃんと 姉ちゃんには できたんだ！:
If we could at least drop them in the ocean.My
brother and sister could have done it! Even I
could do it!

308513.「みんなで 穴ぐらを出たときも\n こんな夕日を 見たっけ……。:
I remember seeing a sunset like this when we
left the cellar together.

308514.「ボクも みんなを導く 光になれたかな？\n あの日の 兄ちゃん みたい……に…:
I wonder if I could be the light that guides
everyone. Like my brother on that day.

308515.「ドルタムさん……。\n カブさん ナンナさん ハクオウさん。:
Mr. Doltam. Mr. Kabu, Ms. Nanna, and Mr.
Hakuo.

308516.「これは あなた方がいなければ\n なしえなかった 勝利です……。\n ありがと:
This is a victory that would not have been
possible without you. Thank you. Thank you to
the utmost.

308517.「……戻りましょうか。天星郷の皆も\n 報告を 待っているでしょうから……。:
Shall we go back, I'm sure everyone at the
Firmament is waiting to hear from you.

308518.「魔眼の月の 消滅を確認した。\n 何があったか 聞かせてくれ。:
The Eye of Evil is gone. Let me know what
happened.

308519.<cs_pchero>は ジア・レド・ゲノスを\n倒したことや 神剣で魔眼の月を:
<13_aaaaaac>reported on his defeat of Dia Ledo Genos, his
crushing of Eye of Evil with the divine sword,
and this whole battle.

308520.そして その勝利が カブやナンナ\nドルタム ハクオウらの犠牲によって\nもたら:
He also announced that the victory came at the
expense of Kabu, NannaDoltam Hakuo, and
others.

308521.「察しは ついていたよ。 \n ここに いないんだものなぁ……。\n あまりにも:
I had an idea.I had an idea. I made you pay
too big a price.

308522.「しばし 散っていった英雄たちのために祈ろう。\n 彼らの魂が 創世の女神の御許:
For a moment, let us pray for our fallen
heroes. May their souls find their way to the
Goddess of Creation and rest in peace.

308523.「天星郷を……いや アストルティアを\n 代表して 礼を言わせてもらおう。\n:
On behalf of the Firmament, and indeed
Astoltia, I thank you. Thank you, heroes!

308524.「さっきから 気になっていたのだが\n ユーライザ……妙な格好をしているな。\n:
I have been noticing that Yuliza is dressed
strangely. She looks like an angel from the
old world.

308525.「遅ればせながら 神化を果たしました。\n 私も ここにいる英雄たちと同じく\n:
I have achieved deification, albeit belatedly.
I, like all the heroes here, am now one of
God's own.

308526.「……ユーライザ神に 後事を託し\n 私は 隠居したほうが いいのかな。:
Maybe I should leave Yuliza to take care of
things and retire.

308527.「正気ですか！ 神とはいえ まだユーライザに\n 天星郷の長が つとまるワケがな:
Are you insane? How can Yuliza still be the
head of the Firmament, even though she is a
god?

308530.「しょっぱいなぁ……。\n 人生の味がするよ モーモリーナ。:
It's so salty. It tastes like life,
Sanguilina.

308531.「ありがたく いただくことね。\n 完食すれば 神には なれなくても\n １ラン:
You should eat it gratefully. If you finish
the meal, you may not become a god, but you
may become a being of a higher rank.

308534.「ちょっとちょっと みんな～。\n ここは 笑う所じゃないのよ～。:
Hey, hey, hey, hey, guys~. This is not the
place to laugh~.

308535.「気を落とさないでね。\n この戦いで あなたが示した 勇敢さと\n 気高さは:
Don't be discouraged. The bravery and nobility
you have shown in this battle is undisputed.

308537.「ただの天使に 戻ってしまいました。\n それでも あなたや……人間たちを\n:
I have returned to being a mere angel. Even
so, I will continue to protect you and other
humans, won't I?

308538.「こたびの戦いで ジア・クト念晶体の\n 魔の手から 世界が守られたことを\n:
Most people on earth do not know that this
battle has protected the world from the evil
hand of Dia Kut telecrystal.

308539.「ジア・クトの侵略は アストルティアの歴史に\n 残らないだろうし それでよいと:
The Dia Kut invasion will not remain in
Astoltia's history, and I think that's okay.

308540.「だが 我ら 天星郷の民は\n この戦いに身を投じた 英雄たちの生き様を\n 記:
But we, the people of the Firmament, will
remember the lives of these heroes and pass
them on from generation to generation!

308541.「さて かたい話は これくらいにして \n ここで私が 一曲 披露しよう。\n:
Well, enough of the garrulous talk, let me
play a song here. The song is "Kizudarake no
Aiko Tenshi.

308542.「……なんて思っていたんだが 代わりに\n 極上の歌い手が 名乗りを上げてくれた:
I was thinking, "What a surprise!" But
instead, a superb singer came forward to sing
for us!

308543.「始源の歌姫 リナーシェだ！\n 拍手で お迎えしてくれ！:
First Diva Linashe! Please welcome with
applause!

308544.「じつは 天使長さまに 無理を言って\n この場をもうけて いただきました。:
I am very grateful to Mr. Archangel for giving
me this opportunity.

308545.「わたくしが 天星郷への招きに応じ\n 英雄になると決断したのは……\n この上:
It was for the most selfish of reasons that I
accepted the invitation to the Firmament and
decided to be a hero.

308546.「最愛の妹……アリアが残した国を 守るための\n チカラがほしかった。その 一心:
I wanted the power to protect the country my
beloved sister Aria left behind. It was with
this single thought in mind.

308547.「英雄とか 神とか どうでもよかった……。: I didn't care about heroes or gods.

308548.「ですが 思いがけず 子孫と触れあう\n 機会を得られ 彼らの未来を守れました。:
But I had the unexpected opportunity to
interact with my offspring and protect their
future. Now I feel proud to be a hero!

308549.「この戦いで 死んでいった者たちの魂を\n なぐさめるために。そして……:
To comfort the souls of those who died in this
battle. And

308550.「生き残った者たちを 祝福するために \n 歌います。それでは 聴いてください…:
I sing to bless the survivors. So please
listen.

308551.「おどろかせて すまない。\n 彼女は 消滅を予期していたんだ。:
Sorry to scare you. HER was expecting to
disappear.

308552.「最期に 歌で皆を祝福したいと\n 頼まれてな……。ただ しめっぽくなるのは\n:
He asked me to bless everyone with a song at the end of his life. But I didn't want to become a shimeisha, so I was told not to say
anything.

308553.「けど こんなに早く 消えてしまうとは\n さすがに 予想外だったよ……。:
But I didn't expect it to disappear so
quickly.

308554.「ここは リナーシェの思いを汲んで\n しめっぽくなるのは なしだ。:
We must not be shime-shime in accordance with
Linashe's wishes here.

308555.「食事と飲み物を 山ほど 用意した。\n 今夜は 思うぞんぶん 食事を楽しんで\:
I have prepared a large pile of food and drinks for you. Enjoy the food as much as you like tonight, and make yourself energized for
tomorrow. That's all.

308557.「これを お前に渡すよう\n リナーシェ殿から 頼まれていた。\n 受け取ってく:
Lord Linashe asked me to give you this. Take
it.

308559.親愛なる <pc>さまへ。\nこのような形で 別れを告げることになり\nごめんな:
Dear <pc>. I am sorry to have to say
goodbye to you this way.

308560.おぼえていますか？ レーンの村へ\n海を見にいったことを。あのとき もう少し\n:
Do you remember? We went to Lane Village to
see the ocean. I told you that I wanted to
spend a little more time with you.

308561.家族以外で 安らぎを覚えられるような人は\nあなたが 初めてだったから……\nあ:
You were the first person outside of my family
that I could find comfort with, and I didn't
want that time to end.

308562.他人を信じず 頼れぬまま 生きてきましたが\n心域まで 助けにきてくれた あなた:
I have lived my life without trusting or
relying on others, but you came to my rescue
and changed my heart.

308563.あなたに会えて よかった。\nあなたと同じ時を過ごせて よかった。\nあなたが生:
I'm glad I met you. I am glad to have spent
the same time with you. I am glad that I could
protect the world in which you live.

308564.さようなら。あなたと あなたの愛する人たちが\nいつまでも 幸福でありますように:
Goodbye. May you and your loved ones be happy
forever. I wish you and your loved ones
happiness forever and ever.

308565.「リナーシェ殿は 立派な英雄だった。\n お前も つらいだろうが…………ん？:
Linashe was a great hero. It must be hard for
you, too.

308567.あなたのとなりで カンティスさまが\nさぞ 気落ちしていることでしょう。\nどう:
I'm sure Kantis must be very depressed next to
you. Please console him.

308568.「天使の心まで お見通しとは……\n やはり あの方は とんだ女狐だ。:
She is a vixen, after all, to be able to see
into the hearts of angels.

308569.「やあ <pc>。\n 君も 外の空気を 吸いにきたようだね。:
Hey <pc>. I see you've come to get
some air, too.

308570.「宴も たけなわ。名残惜しいが \n 勝利の宴も そろそろ おひらきかな。:
The party is over. The feast of victory is
about to end, though it is regrettable to say
the least.

308571.「……リナーシェまで 消えてしまうとはね。\n 何も言わず 去るというのが\n:
I didn't expect Linashe to disappear as well.
It's just like her to leave without saying
anything.

308572.「おや？ ひょっとして 君にだけ\n 何か 言葉を残していったのかな？:
Hmm? Did he leave any words just for you, by
any chance?

308573.「私も 消えるときは 君にだけ\n 遺言を残すとしよう……フフ。:
When I disappear, I will leave you my last
will and testament.

308574.「今のは うめき声かな？\n 近いようだ。行ってみよう。:
Was that a moan? Looks like we're getting
close. Let's go.

308576.「これは これは……神様。\n いいところに 来てくれやがってよぉ……。:
Well, well, well. You've come to the right
place.

308577.「ジア・クトの捕虜が うろついてたんで\n とっ捕まえようと したんだが……\n:
There was a POW from Dia Kut hanging around,
and I tried to grab him, but he turned on me!

308578.「あの野郎……何を たくらんでるのか……。\n 神化の光炉は どこにあるのかって:
What is that bastard up to? He frightened me,
asking where the Furnace of Deification is.

308579.「この頂上にあるって……答えておいたぜ。\n 上にある光炉は ガラクタ同然なのに:
I told him it's at the top of the mountain.
The furnace up there is like a junk. Heh heh,
I'm sorry you got cheated.

308581.「ラダ・ガート……だけだ。\n ついさっき 捕虜を追って 上に行った。:
Only Lada Gart. He went up there just a few
minutes ago in pursuit of the prisoners.

308582.「最期に話すのが お前だなんてな……。\n ルティアナ様の ひざに抱かれて逝くの:
I can't believe you're the last person I'm
going to talk to. It was my dream to die in
Lutiana's lap, but this isn't so bad.

308583.「天星郷を守ってくださった 神様みたいな\n 英雄に見守られて 逝けるなんざ\n:
There is no greater honor than to pass away
under the watchful eye of a hero like God who
protected the Firmament, isn't there?

308584.「君は ラダ・ガートの加勢に。\n 私は ミトラーたちを呼んでくる。:
You go and join Lada Gart. I'll call Mitra and
the others.

308586.「お前のおかげで よい息抜きができた。\n のんびりした時間を 過ごすのも 悪く:
I've had a nice break, thanks to you. It's
never a bad idea to take things easy every
so often.

308587.「アシュレイが消え ユーライザまで\n あんなことに なってしまった……。\n:
Ashley is gone, and Yuliza is not far behind,
it seems... You were close with both of them,
were you not?

308588.「落ち込んでるかも しれないと思い\n 気晴らしに さそってみたのだ……。\n:
I thought you might be feeling down, so I
invited you out here as a distraction...
Perhaps it was out of character for me.

308589.「……らしくないと言えば 今日の俺は\n しゃべりすぎだな。昔のことばかり……。:
Speaking of being out of character...I've
talked too much today. Dwelling on the
past...

308590.「いい機会だ。娘のことを……\n ガラテアのことを 聞いてくれ。:
It's a good opportunity. Let me tell you about
my daughter...Galatea.

308591.「ガートラント 建国の際 封印されていた\n 魔祖の血族を 解き放った話は もう:
Did I not tell you about the bloodline of the
Demon Ancestors being unleashed? That began
the long battle against them all.

308592.「後世に 憂いを残すまいと\n 魔祖の血族を 根絶やしにするため\n 全身全霊で:
I fought with everything I had to eradicate
the Demon Ancestors' bloodline, so as to
prevent anguish for future generations...

308593.「だが 魔祖の血族をひきいる\n 羅刹王バラシュナは 手ごわく\n 戦況は日々:
However, one of their descendants, Barashna,
was a formidable opponent. The battle raged
on, each day bringing advances and retreats.

308594.「当時の俺は 娘のガラテアに 城をまかせ\n みずから 激戦地で指揮を執っていた:
